questions.front: Who was the first president of the United States of America?
questions.fullText: George Washington was the first president of the United States of America.

questions.front: Who is the current president of the United States of America?
questions.fullText: Donald Trump is the current president of the United States of America

questions.front: Who is the current vice president of the United States of America?
questions.fullText: Mike Pence is the current vice president of the United States of America.
